page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: {HOBBIES AND HOLIDAYS } We are ten children, five boys and five girls and these are our hobbies. We look after animals such as dogs, cats, hamsters, rabbits, goats, bantams, hens, horses, calves, birds, sheep, pigs, pet lambs and pet mice. We ride bicycles: BMX and Motorcross. BMX stands for Bicycle Motorcross and they are strengthened bikes for riding on rough ground and doing freestyle stunts. Four children play with the local band. It is an accordian band with drums and triangles. We collect things like stamps, coins models, teddy bears. We belong to National Organisations like the Girls Brigade, Cubs and Brownies.
